name: Iris (nyarlathonic, Chasely)
description:
Iris, Goddess of the Rainbow, has been caught in a squabble between Phoebus and Artemis.  Her accouterments lost and her rainbow cloak damaged, she must wander the dark forest and borrow colors from flowers in order to  take to the air once more.

Music by Panman14 ( ytpanman14@gmail.com )

Art by Chase ( Chasely on itch.io )
